name: LambGame
description:
IF PLAYING IN BROWSER CLICK THE BLUE ARROW IN RIGHT CORNER FOR FULLSCREEN! IMPORTANT TO SEE EVERYTHING. Game works bettern when download but o well. 

Control the two charaters to the goal. 

Move with A/D.

Jump with space.

Swap between them with Q/E

R to restart.

You cant jump on the multicolor block.

Theme was : a different planet. I went with the idea of "Men Are from Mars, Women Are from Venus".  

Everything done by me. 

Insperation was taken from (in no order):

 Brackeys Youtube, Celeste,  Sunny Land assets.
